name: United Refuah HealthShare
statementOfFaith: Members must abide by the ethical and practical laws and lifestyle of Judaism based upon the dictates of the Torah. Commitments to abstain from tobacco/marijuana, avoid substance abuse, and maintain health through balanced diet and exercise.

preExisting.sharingLimits: Year 1: not shared. Years 2-3: up to $25,000/condition/year. Year 4+: fully shareable. Some conditions may require permanent waivers.

bestFor: Jewish families seeking faith-aligned health sharing with simple flat-rate pricing, low deductibles, and included dental/vision
pros: Simple flat-rate pricing regardless of age — $199/$349/$499 per month
Very low Annual PreShare Amounts ($500-$1,500) compared to most health shares
$1,000,000 per-incident limit with no lifetime maximum
Includes dental ($300/year), vision ($50/year), and mental health (12 visits/year) — uncommon among health shares
Preventive care shared at 100% with no APA/CoShare requirement
cons: Jewish faith requirement limits eligibility to Jewish individuals and families
Strict pre-notification/pre-approval required for many procedures — failure may result in denied sharing
Maternity restrictions: must be married at conception, 10-month enrollment waiting period
Standard prescriptions not covered (only hospital inpatient and high-dollar medications)
aiSummary: United Refuah HealthShare is the only Jewish health sharing ministry, founded in 2018 in Cleveland Heights, OH with approximately 8,000 members. It uses simple, age-independent flat-rate pricing: $199/month (single), $349/month (couple), $499/month (family). APA (deductible) ranges from $500-$1,500. Coverage cap of $1,000,000 per incident with no lifetime limit. Unique among health shares in including dental ($300/year), vision ($50/year), and mental health (12 visits/year). Covers telehealth (TeleRefuah, $0), maternity (with restrictions), preventive care at 100%, emergency, and surgery. Requires Jewish faith. No provider network — any doctor, reimbursed at up to 150% of Medicare rates.
aiKeyFacts: Monthly cost: $199 (single), $349 (couple), $499 (family) — flat rate regardless of age
Per-incident cap: $1,000,000 with no lifetime maximum
Includes dental ($300/yr), vision ($50/yr), mental health (12 visits/yr)
Preventive care shared at 100% (no APA applies)
No provider network — any doctor, reimbursed at 150% of Medicare
5-30 day processing time (fast compared to industry)
